CustomField.description: The color the row should be highlighted in. This value should correspond to an HTML formatted color code. i.e. #FFFFFF = white, #000000 = black, #D43230 = red etc. If no color is set a default lightning color is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The color the row should be highlighted in. This value should correspond to an HTML formatted color code. i.e. #FFFFFF = white, #000000 = black, #D43230 = red etc. If no color is set a default lightning color is used.
CustomField.label: Highlight Color
